root.name: Wizardry Online
root.description: OverviewWizardry Online free to play MMO, developed in Japan and based on the classic RPG franchise Wizardry. The game was created as a "hardcore" MMO, with open PvP and permadeath.ClassesFighterPriestThiefMageRacesHumanElfDwarfGnomePorkulSystem RequirementsMinimumOS: XP SP3Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.4GHz (E6600) / Athlon X64 3400Memory: 2 GB RAMGraphics: GeForce 7900GT / Radeon X850DirectX®: 9.0cHard Drive: 8 GB HD spaceOther Requirements: Broadband Internet connectionRecommendedOS: Windows XP(SP3) / Windows Vista(SP2) / Windows 7(SP1)Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8400Memory: 2 GB RAMGraphics: GeForce GTS 250DirectX®: 9.0cHard Drive: 8 GB HD spaceOther Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
